content:
Hi all, I am unable to open Profiles and Extensions of VHDIR (http://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/VhDir/index.html) in Forge(STU3) tool. Can Anyone Suggest me , Is there any Updated Tool to open R4 Profiles and Extensions?
Thanks in Advance.
Hello @lakshmi thrivarna, Forge does not yet support FHIR R4 release. We will upgrade all our tools after the official publication of the final R4 standard.
@Michel Rutten Thank you for your information,May i know when will it upgrade?
A while after FHIR R4 has been officially published.
What do you want to do with them?
